original: A cluster of carefully programmed nanites designed to fully cover the body and defend against external threats.  Can be activated to produce heat.
translation: 一组精心设计的纳米微粒，用来完全覆盖身体并抵御外部威胁。可以被激活产生热量。

original: A cluster of carefully programmed nanites designed to fully cover the body and defend against external threats.  Currently heating itself.
translation: 一组精心设计的纳米微粒，用来完全覆盖身体并抵御外部威胁。目前正在加热。

original: A container full of bio-compatible nanites that have entered an idle state and are ready to be removed. (Disassemble to recover)
translation: 装满生物相容纳米微粒的容器，这些纳米微粒已经进入闲置状态，准备被移除。（拆卸回收）

original: A container full of materials and a small cluster of bio-compatible nanites programmed to replicate.  After they finish, they will enter an idle state and be ready to be removed.
translation: 一个装满材料的容器和一小群生物相容的纳米微粒，它们被设计成可以复制。完成后，它们将进入空闲状态并准备被删除。

original: A half-height strong metal wall.  Keeps zombies outside the vehicle but allows people to see over it.
translation: 半高坚固的金属墙。让僵尸呆在车外，但让人们可以看到它。

original: A heavily compressed liquid storage device, it is also capable of keeping its contents fresh and maintaining their temperature.
translation: 作为一种高度压缩的液体储存装置，它还能够保持其内容物的新鲜度并保持其温度。

original: A heavy metal framework infused with nanites working to augment the durability.  Other vehicle components can be mounted on it, and it can be attached to other frames to increase the vehicle's size.
translation: 一个重金属框架注入纳米工作，以增加耐用性。其他车辆部件可以安装在其上，并可以连接到其他框架，以增加车辆的大小。

original: A highly durable iris composed of nanites, this blocks sight while also acting as a combination of door and armor.
translation: 一个高度耐用的虹膜组成的纳米，这阻止视线，同时也作为一个门和盔甲的组合。

original: A large and bulky nanofactory sitting on a frame somehow not functioning properly.
translation: 一个巨大而笨重的纳米工厂坐落在一个框架上，不知何故运转不正常。

original: A large and bulky prototype nanofactory sitting on a frame somehow not functioning properly
translation: 一个庞大的原型纳米工厂坐落在一个框架上，不知何故不能正常运作

original: A large blob of nanites with an AI, it actively branches out pseudopods to assist with crafting efforts performed nearby.  Additionally, it will act as most tools upon command.
translation: 一大团带有人工智能的纳米微粒，它积极地分支出伪足来协助附近的手工制作工作。此外，它将作为大多数命令工具。

original: A large blob of nanites with an AI, it actively branches out pseudopods to grasp items held near it and supports them as optimally as possible
translation: 一个巨大的带有人工智能的纳米微粒，它积极地分支出伪足来抓住它附近的物品，并尽可能以最佳方式支撑它们

original: A large blob of nanites with an AI, it actively branches out pseudopods to grasp items held near it and supports them as optimally as possible, including reaching down and forming 'legs' to support itself if needed.
translation: 一大团带有人工智能的纳米微粒，它积极地伸出伪足来抓住附近的物品，并尽可能地以最佳方式支撑它们，包括伸手向下并形成“腿”来支撑自己（如果需要）。

original: A large blob of nanites you can enter, it acts as a combined control system, chair, and camera control system all in one.
translation: 你可以进入一个巨大的纳米颗粒，它作为一个综合控制系统，椅子，和相机控制系统都在一个。

original: A large cluster of nanites actively forming a support network for other structures to attach to.  Other vehicle components can be mounted on it, and it can be attached to other frames to increase the vehicle's size.
translation: 一个巨大的纳米结构集群，积极形成一个支撑网络，供其他结构附着。其他车辆部件可以安装在其上，并可以连接到其他框架，以增加车辆的大小。

original: A large frame made of steel and reinforced with nanites.  Useful for crafting.
translation: 一种由钢铁制成并用纳米材料加固的大框架。对制作有用。

original: A large sheet of nanites arranged to capture sunlight and convert it to electrical energy.
translation: 一大块纳米材料，用来捕捉阳光并将其转化为电能。

original: A large shield composed of a cluster of nanites, currently in active mode, it will automatically attempt to block attacks for you, allowing you to make use of your hand.  When not in use, it compresses itself into the handle.
translation: 一个由一群纳米机器人组成的大盾牌，目前处于活动模式，它会自动尝试为你阻挡攻击，让你可以利用你的手。不使用时，它会将自身压缩到手柄中。

original: A large shield composed of a cluster of nanites, currently in passive mode, you can block attacks with it.  When not in use, it compresses itself into the handle.
translation: 一个由一群纳米分子组成的大盾牌，目前处于被动模式，你可以用它阻挡攻击。不使用时，它会将自身压缩到手柄中。

original: A mass of nanites and power cells optimized for generating power.
translation: 为发电而优化的大量纳米材料和动力电池。

original: A mass of nanites optimized for travel across any land-based surface while lifting a larger object.
translation: 一堆纳米微粒，经过优化，可以在提升较大物体的同时穿越任何陆地表面。

original: A mass of nanites programmed to locate mechanical power systems and interface with them to provide mechanical power.
translation: 一堆被编程用来定位机械动力系统并与之连接以提供机械动力的纳米材料。

original: A mass of nanites programmed to store vast amounts of power.
translation: 一堆被编程用来储存大量能量的纳米微粒。

original: A nanotech aisle, capable of assisting with lifting nearby objects.
translation: 一种纳米技术通道，能够帮助提升附近的物体。

original: A nanotech pistol adapted for vehicular usage.
translation: 一种适于车辆使用的纳米技术手枪。

original: A nanotech rifle adapted for vehicular usage.
translation: 一种适于车辆使用的纳米技术步枪。

original: A nanotech roof that is capable of interfacing with a turret.
translation: 一种纳米技术屋顶，能够与炮塔连接。

original: A nanotech shredder adapted for vehicular usage.
translation: 一种适于车辆使用的纳米技术粉碎机。

original: A nanotech smg adapted for vehicular usage.
translation: 一种适于车辆使用的纳米技术smg。

original: A perfectly smooth floor with matching roof composed of nanites, can easily withstand almost anything.
translation: 一个完美光滑的地板和匹配的屋顶组成的纳米，可以很容易地承受几乎任何东西。

original: A perfectly smooth roof composed of nanites, can easily withstand almost anything.
translation: 一个由纳米材料组成的完美光滑的屋顶，几乎可以承受任何东西。

original: A repaired laptop usable for programming.  Requires external power source to charge.
translation: 可用于编程的修理过的笔记本电脑。需要外部电源充电。

original: A sealed iris composed of nanites, this door is capable of withstanding nearly anything.
translation: 一个密封的虹膜组成的纳米，这门是能够承受几乎任何东西。

original: A series of straps attached to the seat, intended to fasten together after going over your shoulders and hips and between your legs.
translation: 系在座位上的一系列带子，在穿过肩膀、臀部和两腿之间后系在一起。

original: A shimmering pool of liquid metal with a long barrel sticking out, this turret specializes in accuracy, though it lacks in raw power.
translation: 一个闪闪发光的液态金属池和一个长长的桶突出，这个炮塔擅长精确，虽然它缺乏原始力量。

original: A shimmering pool of liquid metal with a short barrel sticking out, this turret specializes in speed, though it lacks in range and sustainability.
translation: 一个闪闪发光的液态金属池与一个短桶伸出，这个炮塔擅长于速度，但它缺乏的范围和可持续性。

original: A shimmering pool of liquid metal with a small barrel sticking out, this turret specializes in accuracy, though it lacks in raw power.
translation: 一个闪闪发光的液态金属池和一个小木桶突出，这个炮塔擅长精确，虽然它缺乏原始力量。

original: A shimmering pool of liquid metal with a wide barrel sticking out, this turret specializes in power, though it lacks in accuracy and range.
translation: 一个闪闪发光的液态金属池与一个广泛的桶突出，这座炮塔擅长于权力，虽然它缺乏准确性和范围。

original: A small blob of nanites with an AI, it actively branches out pseudopods to grasp blades held nearby it, and put them into the user's hands automatically as needed.
translation: 一小团带有人工智能的纳米微粒，它主动地伸出伪足，抓住附近的刀片，并根据需要自动将它们放到用户手中。

original: A small blob of nanites with an AI, it actively branches out pseudopods to grasp guns held nearby it, and put them into the user's hands automatically as needed.
translation: 一小团带有人工智能的纳米机器人，它主动地伸出伪足抓住附近的枪，并根据需要自动将它们放到用户手中。

original: A small blob of nanites with an AI, it stores magazines and assists in loading them as needed.
translation: 一小片带有人工智能的纳米颗粒，它储存弹夹，并根据需要协助装入弹夹。

original: A small terminal that interfaces with nearby nanites to upload preconfigured programs to them.
translation: 一种小型终端，与附近的纳米设备连接，向它们上传预先配置的程序。

original: A small terminal that interfaces with nearby nanites to upload preconfigured programs to them.  It is also able to hack into robots using remote groups of nanites.
translation: 一种小型终端，与附近的纳米设备连接，向它们上传预先配置的程序。它还可以利用远程的纳米小组入侵机器人。

original: A strong metal wall.  Keeps zombies outside the vehicle and prevents people from seeing through it.
translation: 坚固的金属墙。让僵尸呆在车外，防止人们看穿。

original: A very durable barrier composed of nanites acting as a door, it also contains a fine mesh that acts as a window.
translation: 一种非常耐用的屏障，由纳米材料组成，起到门的作用，它还包含一个细网，起到窗户的作用。

original: A very large blob of nanites that can be easily programmed into multiple different complex forms due to the included AI.
translation: 一个非常大的纳米微粒，可以很容易地编程成多种不同的复杂形式，由于包括人工智能。

original: A very large blob of nanites that can be easily programmed into multiple different forms.
translation: 一个非常大的纳米微粒，可以很容易地编程成多种不同的形式。

original: Advanced nanotech sensor array with basic armor, can transmit video to a camera control system or a nanotech control pod.
translation: 先进的纳米技术传感器阵列与基本装甲，可以传输视频到摄像机控制系统或纳米技术控制吊舱。

original: An automated ammo production unit designed to process feedstock into usable ammo as needed, complete with integrated power source.  Unfortunately, it needs to be manually reset when emptied, and cannot be refilled by hand.
translation: 一种自动弹药生产装置，用于根据需要将原料加工成可用的弹药，并配有集成电源。不幸的是，它需要手动复位时，清空，不能重新填补的手。

original: An incredibly durable and perfectly uniform wall composed of nanites.  More than capable of supporting a roof, as well as keeping out most practically anything.
translation: 一个令人难以置信的持久和完美统一的墙组成的纳米。它不仅能支撑屋顶，还能把几乎所有东西挡在外面。

original: An incredibly sharp blade of active nanites with a small handle.  Compresses itself into the handle when not in use.
translation: 一种非常锋利的带有小手柄的活性纳米材料。不使用时将自身压缩到手柄中。

original: An incredibly sharp blade of active nanites with a small handle.  Compresses itself into the handle when not in use.  In addition to the typical blade, it can project blades around your fingers to be used as a claw or punching dagger.
translation: 一种非常锋利的带有小手柄的活性纳米材料。不使用时将自身压缩到手柄中。除了典型的刀片，它可以项目刀片周围的手指被用作爪或冲孔匕首。

original: An incredibly sharp spike of active nanites on a long handle, it contains small but powerful boosters for sweeping strikes as a staff as well.  Compresses itself into a small tube when not in use.
translation: 在一个长柄上有一个令人难以置信的尖锐的活性纳米颗粒，它包含了小而强大的助推器，作为一个工作人员也可以用来扫荡罢工。不用时把自己压缩成一个小管子。

original: An opened iris composed of nanites, this door is capable of withstanding nearly anything.
translation: 一个开放的虹膜组成的纳米，这扇门是能够承受几乎任何东西。

original: An outer coating of nanites that work together to seal out water while also providing another layer of protection.
translation: 一种由纳米材料组成的外层涂层，它们一起起到密封水的作用，同时还提供另一层保护。
一批非活性生物相容纳米材料。
一批不活跃的纳米颗粒。

original: Batch of material with instructions to produce bursts of blades.
translation: 一批带有生产刀片的说明的材料。

original: Batch of material with instructions to produce bursts of darts.
translation: 一批有指示的材料，用来制造飞镖。

original: Batch of material with instructions to produce clouds of twisting wire.  WARNING: DEADLY TO USER!
translation: 一批带说明书的材料，用来制造一团缠绕的金属丝。警告：对用户致命！

original: Coiled high-conductivity metal for advanced fabrication.
translation: 用于先进制造的卷曲高导电金属。

original: Coiled metal stock for advanced fabrication.
translation: 先进制造的盘绕金属材料。

original: Coiled plastic feedstock for advanced fabrication.
translation: 先进制造的卷曲塑料原料。

original: Collection of nanites formed into a hollow container, a large portion of their power is devoted to maintaining a cool temperature, leading to them being immobile and blocking passage.
translation: 纳米微粒的集合形成一个中空的容器，其很大一部分能量用于维持低温，导致它们无法移动并堵塞通道。

original: Collection of nanites formed into a hollow container, a large portion of their power is devoted to maintaining a frozen temperature, leading to them being immobile and blocking passage.
translation: 纳米微粒的集合形成一个中空的容器，它们的大部分能量用于维持冻结的温度，导致它们无法移动并阻塞通道。

original: Collection of nanites formed into a hollow sphere with a complex mechanism to compress and decompress liquid to extreme levels.
translation: 纳米微粒的集合形成一个空心球体，具有复杂的压缩和减压机制。

original: Contains data on how to work with nanites.
translation: 包含有关如何使用纳米技术的数据。

original: Contains data on producing standard items from a nanofactory.
translation: 包含从纳米工厂生产标准产品的数据。

original: Controls nanites to reassemble feedstock into products at high speed and efficiency, contains a minor AI to assist with programming.
translation: 控制纳米技术以高速度和高效率将原料重新组装成产品，包含辅助编程的小型人工智能。

original: Controls nanites to reassemble feedstock into products at high speed and efficiency, contains an advanced AI, and is capable of any nanofabrication currently developed.
translation: 控制纳米材料以高速度和高效率将原料重新组装成产品，含有先进的人工智能，能够进行目前开发的任何纳米加工。

original: Experimental AI core, once used for high-end research tasks.
translation: 实验AI核心，曾用于高端研究任务。

original: Extremely high-end items based around nanotech and 3D printing, mutations to be added later.
translation: 基于纳米技术和3D打印的超高端产品，稍后将添加突变。

original: Incredibly finely powdered metal, it is useless for anything except use in specialized nanotech turrets.
translation: 令人难以置信的金属粉末，它是无用的，除了在专门的纳米技术炮塔使用。

original: Large block of material for producing large clouds of monomolecular wire.  WARNING: DEADLY TO USER!
translation: 用来制造大团单分子线的大块材料。警告：对用户致命！

original: Low quality, bulky, slow, but highly secured nanite fabrication system.  Designed for safety, not quality, but with some hard work you may be able to salvage something of use, or maybe use it.
translation: 低质量，笨重，缓慢，但高度安全的纳米制造系统。设计是为了安全，不是为了质量，但是通过一些艰苦的工作，你也许可以挽救一些有用的东西，或者使用它。

original: Nanite control unit that can mimic many tools, though some require different configurations.  Currently configured as a laser welder.
translation: Nanite控制单元，可以模拟许多工具，但有些需要不同的配置。目前配置为激光焊机。

original: Nanite control unit that can mimic many tools, though some require different configurations.  Currently expanded into a larger form for bulkier tools.
translation: Nanite控制单元，可以模拟许多工具，但有些需要不同的配置。目前已扩展为更大的形式，用于更大的工具。

original: Nanite control unit that can mimic many tools, though some require different configurations.  Currently in default form, allowing access to numerous small tools.
translation: Nanite控制单元，可以模拟许多工具，但有些需要不同的配置。当前为默认形式，允许访问许多小型工具。

original: Nanites formed into a highly active mesh designed to shred anything they collide with.
translation: 纳米微粒形成了一个高度活跃的网状结构，可以粉碎任何与之相撞的物体。

original: Nanites formed into a self-reinforcing mesh designed to reduce incoming damage.
translation: 纳米材料形成了一个自增强网，旨在减少外来的损害。

original: Nanotech launcher, fires huge masses of monomolecular wire that shreds anything that isn't heavily protected.
translation: 纳米技术发射装置发射大量的单分子金属丝，这些金属丝可以撕碎任何没有严格保护的东西。

original: Nanotech pistol turret, fires bursts of of monomolecular darts.  Each shot is 10x the projectiles as the unmounted version, leading to ability to hit at a longer distance and a bit more damage.  It feeds in powdered metal using a system similar to liquid transfer through the vehicle, then compresses it into ammo as needed.
translation: 纳米技术手枪炮塔，发射单分子飞镖。每发子弹的射程是未装子弹的10倍，因此射程更长，伤害更大。它使用一种类似于液体通过载具转移的系统将金属粉末送入，然后根据需要将其压缩成弹药。

original: Nanotech pistol, fires bursts of different configurations of monomolecular ammo based on loaded ammo core.
translation: 纳米技术手枪，发射不同配置的单分子弹药爆炸的基础上加载弹药核心。

original: Nanotech rifle turret, fires large bursts of monomolecular darts.  Each shot is 10x the projectiles as the unmounted version, leading to ability to hit at a longer distance and a bit more damage.  It feeds in powdered metal using a system similar to liquid transfer through the vehicle, then compresses it into ammo as needed.
translation: 纳米技术步枪炮塔，发射大量单分子飞镖。每发子弹的射程是未装子弹的10倍，因此射程更长，伤害更大。它使用一种类似于液体通过载具转移的系统将金属粉末送入，然后根据需要将其压缩成弹药。

original: Nanotech rifle, fires large bursts of different configurations of monomolecular ammo based on loaded ammo core.
translation: 纳米技术步枪，根据装填的弹药核心发射不同配置的单分子弹药。

original: Nanotech shotgun turret, blasts out large clouds of monomolecular darts.  Each shot is 10x the projectiles as the unmounted version, leading to ability to hit at a longer distance and a bit more damage.  It feeds in powdered metal using a system similar to liquid transfer through the vehicle, then compresses it into ammo as needed.
translation: 纳米技术猎枪炮塔，发射出大量单分子飞镖。每发子弹的射程是未装子弹的10倍，因此射程更长，伤害更大。它使用一种类似于液体通过载具转移的系统将金属粉末送入，然后根据需要将其压缩成弹药。

original: Nanotech shotgun, blasts out large clouds of different configurations of monomolecular ammo based on loaded ammo core.
translation: 纳米技术猎枪，根据装填好的弹药核心，发射出不同配置的单分子弹药的大云团。

original: Nanotech smg turret, fires a storm of monomolecular darts.  Each shot is 10x the projectiles as the unmounted version, leading to ability to hit at a longer distance and a bit more damage.  It feeds in powdered metal using a system similar to liquid transfer through the vehicle, then compresses it into ammo as needed.
translation: 纳米科技smg炮塔，发射一系列单分子飞镖。每发子弹的射程是未装子弹的10倍，因此射程更长，伤害更大。它使用一种类似于液体通过载具转移的系统将金属粉末送入，然后根据需要将其压缩成弹药。

original: Nanotech smg, fires a storm of different configurations of monomolecular ammo based on loaded ammo core.
translation: 纳米科技smg，发射了一个风暴的不同配置的单分子弹药的基础上加载弹药核心。

original: Seeing this is a bug - nanovp
translation: 看到这是一个错误-纳米VP

original: Seeing this is a bug - nanovp_fold
translation: 看到这是一个错误-纳米折叠

original: The nanotech project ALMOST finished in time to try to stop things.  But almost doesn't quite cut it these days.  You were tasked with keeping the prototypes safe, and trying to continue the research.
translation: 为了阻止事态发展，纳米技术项目几乎及时完成。但这些天几乎没有完全解决。你的任务是保证原型的安全，并继续研究。

original: Uses internal nanites to pack feedstock into bricks in ammo cartridges, as well as program them for proper output.  Due to the highly limited products, it is more flexible and can take unprocessed raw materials as well.
translation: 使用内部纳米技术将原料装入弹药筒中的砖块中，并对其进行编程以获得适当的输出。由于产品的高度限制，它更灵活，可以采取未经加工的原材料，以及。

original: Uses internal nanites to reassemble feedstock into products at high speed and efficiency.
translation: 使用内部纳米颗粒将原料重新组装成高速高效的产品。
你不应该看到这个-纳米齿轮
你不应该看到这个。纳米炮塔手枪武器
